title: Russia pounds Kyiv hours after Trump-Putin call
shortDescription: Russia pummeled Kyiv with the largest drone attack of the war, hours after President Donald Trump spoke to Russia's Vladimir Putin, officials said.

title: Trump calls bankers 'Shylocks,' a term long considered antisemitic
shortDescription: The president made the remark at a rally launching his yearlong celebration of America’s 250th birthday. He said he '"heard" it was antisemitic.

title: Trump says White House to host UFC fight
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced the White House plans to host a UFC fight for America's 250th birthday next year.

title: Israeli military kills 15 in Gaza as Trump waits for Hamas ceasefire response
shortDescription: At least 15 Palestinians were killed overnight in an Israeli airstrike in Gaza, according to local health officials.

title: Happy cage fighting, America! Trump's UFC birthday plan and how it came to be
shortDescription: The president plans to host a UFC match at the White House. The proposal is just the latest round in a long-standing fascination with the octagon.

title: Will Trump's big tax bill come back to bite the GOP in 2026?
shortDescription: Republicans' tax policy bill will have massive consequences. Both parties are hoping it will boost them in the 2026 election.

title: Trump touts UFC fight at White House, resources for national parks
shortDescription: For the country's 250th anniversary, Trump said there will be a UFC bout at the White House in 2026.

title: What will student loans look like under Trump's bill?
shortDescription: Here's a breakdown on what borrowing federal student loans will look like after both chambers of Congress passed the mega spending bill.

title: Trump celebrates bill passing during Iowa event
shortDescription: "No better birthday present for America." President Donald Trump celebrates the passing of his spending and tax bill during an event in Iowa.

title: Trump tax and spending bill: Does it have a stimulus check?
shortDescription: Republicans' sweeping spending bill has passed Congress and is now heading to President Donald Trump's desk for signature.

title: Trump plans to send 10 letters a day dictating tariff rates to countries
shortDescription: Trump told reporters he would begin sending countries letters setting tariff rates rather than negotiate 170 trade deals worldwide.

title: President Trump reacts to spending bill passing
shortDescription: "It was very easy to get a yes." President Donald Trump reacted to the passing of his tax and spending bill.

title: How Trump's bill affects Medicaid
shortDescription: The House of Representatives passed President Donald Trump's sweeping tax, spending and policy bill, and Medicaid is expected to be heavily impacted.

title: Speaker Mike Johnson touts passing spending bill
shortDescription: After Republicans' sweeping spending bill passed out of Congress, House Speaker Mike Johnson said it'll be "a great thing" for every American.

title: These Trump family members graduated from University of Pennsylvania
shortDescription: University of Penn prohibits trans athletes from women's sports, strips record of swimmer Lia Thomas. Trump Jr. called it a “yuge win” for alma mater.

title: House passes Trump tax and spending bill
shortDescription: Republicans’ sweeping bill to cut taxes and slash benefit programs like Medicaid has passed the House and now heads to President Donald Trump's desk.

title: Which House Republicans voted against Trump bill?
shortDescription: Here are the House Republicans who opposed Trump's legislative package of tax reductions and Medicaid cuts.

title: Trump seeks credit for Waffle House dropping 50-cent egg surcharge
shortDescription: "Thank you President Trump!" President Trump wrote on social media in response to Waffle House dropping its 50-cent egg surcharge.

title: Trump hits Iran with new sanctions as administration ramps up pressure
shortDescription: Trump's administration spent months trying to convince Tehran to enter into a nuclear deal before it joined a bombing campaign spearheaded by Israel.

title: Melania Trump makes rare public appearance at D.C. children's hospital
shortDescription: Trump brought fluffy teddy bears for the kids at Children’s National Hospital and chatted with them about their favorites sports, food and hobbies.

title: When do taxes and Medicaid work requirements in GOP tax bill start?
shortDescription: Different provisions of the GOP tax and spending bill will kick in over the next year or so. Many are set to expire just before Trump's term ends.

title: Trump, Putin speak after US pauses weapons transfers to Ukraine
shortDescription: The United States said it would pause the delivery of some weapons to Ukraine as the Pentagon conducts a review of its munition stockpiles.

title: Police: 21-year-old congressional intern fatally shot in D.C.
shortDescription: Detectives believe UMass student Eric Tarpinian-Jachym was caught in the middle of a shooting and was not the intended target.
